item.title: Command help!
item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

this is my starter and im wondering y it doesnt work?

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter"))
	{
if(starter == 1){
sendMessage("no starter for you noobie");
}
else
{
     addItem(392, 500);
     addItem(554, 500);
     addItem(561, 500);
     addItem(556, 500);
     addItem(557, 500);
     addItem(555, 500);
     addItem(560, 500);
     addItem(562, 500);
     addItem(392, 500);
     addItem(892, 500);
     addItem(4278, 500);  
	    sendMessage("you have received your starter, dont try it again");
	    starter = 1;
            savemoreinfo();
            savechar();
}
      }

thank you for veiwing
